data.title: The Top Ranked Basketball Players of All
data.text:
The Top Ranked Basketball Players of All-Time from Belgium

Notes: Players are ranked on the list of the country they were born in.

Where a player grew up, went to school, or who they represented internationally is not factored into this list.
